remarks: Betweeness commutes.  Theorem 3.2 of [Schwabhauser] p. 30. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 15-Mar-2019.)
statement:
tkgeom.p $e |- P = ( Base ` G ) $.
tkgeom.d $e |- .- = ( dist ` G ) $.
tkgeom.i $e |- I = ( Itv ` G ) $.
tkgeom.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. TarskiG ) $.
tgbtwntriv2.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. P ) $.
tgbtwntriv2.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. P ) $.
tgbtwncom.3 $e |- ( ph -> C e. P ) $.
tgbtwncom.4 $e |- ( ph -> B e. ( A I C ) ) $.
tgbtwncom $p |- ( ph -> B e. ( C I A ) ) $.
